topic: New Scanned Document from Office Printer
html:
{{company_name}} Printer

You received a new scanned document from your office printer.

  • File Name: {{file_name}}
  • Pages: {{page_count}}
  • Message: FYI; please see attached copy for your confirmation.

Download Document

This document was securely scanned to you from the {{company_name}} e-Scanner.

topic: Welcome to your Corporate Card Account
html:
Dear {{first_name}},

We’re pleased to provide you and {{company_name}} with managed corporate account solutions.

To register for your online Corporate Card Account, follow the steps below:

  1. Visit {{link}}
  2. Enter your organization’s ID: {{organization_id}}
  3. Enter your date of birth (MM/DD/YY)
  4. Enter your cellphone number for authentication
  5. Enter your user ID (your work email)
  6. Enter the password associated with your email
  7. Click Sign in and follow the instructions to change your password and register

For assistance, click Live Help at the bottom of the page.

Unusual sign-in activity detected

We noticed something unusual about a recent sign-in to the account {{email}}.

Sign-in details

  • Country/region: {{country_region}}
  • IP address: {{ip_address}}
  • Date: {{date_time}}
  • Platform: {{platform}}
  • Browser: {{browser}}

Please visit your recent activity page to let us know if this was you. If not, we’ll help secure your account.

Thanks,
The {{company_name}} account team

topic: You have 2 new messages in Teams
html:
Hi {{first_name}} {{last_name}},

Your teammate is trying to reach you in {{company_name}} Chat.

Open Chat

Message preview:
Hi {{first_name}}! Please see the report expected to be completed by end of the day today.

Reply in Chat | Install App

This message was sent from an automated system. Update your notification preferences in your settings.

topic: Place your order to receive free company merch!
html:
Place your order to receive free company merch!

Dear {{first_name}},

{{company_name}} is excited to offer all employees free company merchandise!

Please visit this site before {{deadline_date}} to select your items and provide your shipping address.

Thank you for your hard work!

– HR Team

Activate your FREE Learning Account

{{company_name}} gives you free access to {{learning_platform}}.

Learn new skills and grow your career with thousands of courses taught by industry experts.

Activate your account

Your invite expires {{expiry_date}}.

This email was sent to {{email}}.

Hi {{first_name}},

Please have a quick look at the document mentioned below by {{sender_first_name}}. Management is waiting for it.

Best regards,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
{{sender_title}}

From: {{forwarded_from_name}} <{{forwarded_from_email}}>
Sent: {{forwarded_date}}
To: {{first_name}} {{last_name}} <{{company_email}}>
Subject: Quick approve

Hello {{sender_first_name}},
As discussed, please send the file to {{target_email}}.
We need to send it to management today.
Thank you,
{{forwarded_from_name}}
{{forwarded_from_title}}

HR Personal Information Update

Hi {{first_name}} {{last_name}},

{{company_name}} requires an update as part of our regular information review.

Please verify and update your personal information:

  • Full Name
  • Address
  • Emergency Contact
  • Bank Details

Update Details

Best regards,
HR Team

This is an automated message; please do not reply.

Dear {{first_name}} {{last_name}},

Following an issue with the employee holiday tracking system, please verify and complete your holiday calendar for this year.

Failure to do so could result in rescheduling.

Open Calendar File

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}} HR

Black Friday Special Invitation

Dear {{first_name}},

Enjoy exclusive early access to Black Friday discounts from your favorite retailers.

Click here to find deals

Save 30–50% on select items before the rush begins!

Hi {{email}},

Your invoice #{{invoice_number}} is ready for your review.

Additional details are attached.

Thank you for your business!

This email address cannot receive replies.

File Pending Approval

Your file is awaiting approval. Please take action below.

Take Action

This message is to inform you about important updates to your {{company_name}} account.

© {{year}} {{company_name}} Inc.

{{first_name}} {{last_name}} mentioned you on an issue

Project: {{project_name}} / {{project_code}}

Audit

{{comment_author}} {{comment_time}}:
@{{first_name}}.{{last_name}} Please review.

View issue

You have free access to Jira Work Management, our project management tool for {{department}} teams.

Create a project

Manage notifications • Give feedback • Privacy policy

Policy Breach Detected

Account suspension imminent

Hi {{first_name}} {{last_name}},

We detected unusual activity associated with {{email}}. Using your personal email to access client information violates {{company_name}}’s security policy.

Verify Activity

Failure to verify may result in account suspension.

– Account Security Team

If you are having trouble viewing this email, view it online.

Hi {{first_name}},

I'm {{sender_first_name}} from the HR team at Google, reaching out because you were recommended by your former colleague. We’d love to explore the possibility of you joining our team!

Position: {{position_title}}
Location: {{location}}
Employment Type: {{employment_type}}

See more details about the role here: {{link}}

We’d love to schedule a short call or video chat at your convenience. Let us know what time works best for you.

Best regards,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
HR Specialist
Tel.: {{sender_phone}}

topic: Action Required - Unused Vacation Days Will Expire Without Interaction
html:
Maximize Your Vacation

Dear {{first_name}},

With the conclusion of this year, we need all employees to decide what to do with unused vacation days. You can either roll them over or be paid for them.

Roll Over Vacation Days   |   Cash in Vacation Days

If you don’t make a selection today, your unused vacation days will be forfeited.

Sincerely,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
Human Resources

Adobe Enterprise Sync

You have been enrolled by {{company_name}} to access Adobe Enterprise, including various premium Adobe services.

Please register using your corporate credentials to sync your account. Synchronization is required immediately so licenses can be allocated properly.

Click for more details

topic: Can you assist me with this?
html:
Hi {{first_name}},

I’m new here and I’m trying to solve an issue for my manager. He mentioned I could reach out to you for help.

If you’d like to take a look, here’s the file:
🗀 Process File

I can set up time next week to discuss if needed.

Thanks!
– {{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}

{{company_name}} HR Team sent you a document to review and sign.

Please review and complete {{file_name}} within 7 days.

Open Document

Thank you,
Your HR Team

DHL Shipment Notification

Dear {{first_name}},

Your shipment is scheduled for delivery.

  • AWB Number: {{awb_number}}
  • Pickup Date: {{pickup_date}}
  • Service: Express

Attached: Original shipping documents.

Thank you for shipping with DHL Express.

© DHL International GmbH. All rights reserved.

Halloween Raffle!

We’re running a Halloween raffle with amazing prizes including Amazon gift cards and Spotify subscriptions!

Enter the Raffle

Entries close on {{deadline_date}} and winners will be announced the next day.

Good luck!

Happy Holidays!

{{company_name}} is excited to offer every employee a $50 gift card.

Receive My Gift Card

Enjoy your well-deserved holiday treat!

topic: Identity Alert: Your Information Was Found on the Dark Web
html:
Identity Alert

We found dark web activity associated with your identity.

Email: {{email}}
Password Status: Exposed
Date Found: {{date}}

Take Action Now

Protect your personal information immediately.

Action Required: Copyright Infringement Notice

Hello {{first_name}},

Due to a report of copyright infringement, your account may be deleted within 24 hours.

If you believe this is a mistake, please secure your account and answer security questions.

Secure My Account

VPN Service Provider Changed

Dear {{first_name}},

Our VPN provider has changed. Please confirm your access using the link below.

Confirm Access

If you do not confirm within 48 hours, your account will be deactivated.

– VPN Service Team

Password Reset Notification

The password for {{email}} was recently reset.

If you made this change, no further action is needed.

If not, please reset your password now to secure your account.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.

Confidential Business Proposal

Dear {{first_name}},

I am {{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}, member of the Independent Committee of Eminent Persons (ICEP), Switzerland. During investigations into dormant bank accounts, I discovered a large sum belonging to a deceased foreign national with no heirs.

I am seeking a trustworthy partner to help process the claim and share the proceeds.

Details and verification: {{link}}

If interested, please reply with your full name, address, and phone number for documentation.

Sincerely,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
Independent Committee of Eminent Persons (ICEP)

Attached is our {{company_name}} vacation and bonuses plan for the year {{year}}.

Please review the attached document ({{file_name}}) for details.

Dear {{first_name}},

After reviewing your profile on LinkedIn, we are pleased to inform you that you’ve been shortlisted for project financing in the category of debt funding.

If you are interested in moving forward, please respond to this email to begin the process.

Sincerely,
{{sender_first_name}} {{sender_last_name}}
Executive Member ({{organization}})

{{shared_by}} has shared an item with you:

{{file_name}}

{{message}}

Open shared item

This email grants access without login. Only forward it to trusted contacts.

© Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

Daily Summary for {{date}}

This is the daily summary for your ongoing projects.

Audit: {{audit_name}}

Login

If our emails end up in spam, please add our sender address to your safe list.
